Name: MDX_Sales_Group_Industry_level0
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(TM1SUBSETALL([SLS_CUSTOMER]) , 0) , (((((((((((((((((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group]))))))) AND (((((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Distribution Channel] = "20")))))))))))) AND (((((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Organisation Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Organisation]))))))))))))) AND (((((([SLS_CUSTOMER].[Division Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Division]))))))))}
